-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Build tool for Lambdabot
--   
--   This is a build tool for the Lambdabot IRC bot, which processes simple
--   directives to write a bunch of boilerplate Haskell code.
@package botpp
@version 0.1

module BotLib
baseName :: FilePath -> FilePath
expand :: Int -> Int -> String -> ByteString -> ByteString
render :: ByteString -> [ByteString]
modules :: String -> ByteString -> [ByteString]
